header.div: IELTS Writing Task 1You should spend about 20 minutes on this task. You should write at least 150 words.

p.b: You were unable to give an assessed presentation at a tutorial at college because you were ill.
Write a letter to your tutor. Apologise for missing the tutorial and explain why you missed it. Ask if you can arrange to give the presentation another day.

div.p: You do NOT need to write your own address.
